channel.title: Vote4cash system adding a bit stuck help me!
channel.description:
I have question , how i can make the forum like when someone whana vote and there shows username entering, like
do i need to make special page to make people go on that link and just vote? If yes than please can somebody help me where i make one ? help really needed!

item.title: Vote4cash system adding a bit stuck help me!
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

You can use x10hosting, webs, forumotion, anything with a place to create a html page.
